title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Adaptive Education and Inclusive Teacher Capacity Building Through Language Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning theories and educational experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze diverse learner characteristics (language proficiency, cultural background, etc.) to develop personalized instructional design plans.
Learners can foster an inclusive language learning environment and develop flexible assessment strategies through project-based activities.
Learners implement adaptive instructional methods applicable in smartphone-based constrained environments by reflecting on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
